enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: SECOND REVIEW OF ADEQUACY OF UNFCCC ARTICLE 4.2(A) AND (B)
sentences: The issue of the second review of the adequacy of Annex I commitments under UNFCCC Article 4.2(a) and (b) was taken up by the COP on Monday, 6 December.
President González García said he would consult informally on the matter.
No agreement was reached, and the item remains in abeyance.
